languages.text: "Выбирай слова осторожно. Не все Вольные Торговцы одинаково приятны мне". {n}Ульфар дарит Каллигосу вызывающую улыбку, дышащую призывом к немедленной драке.{/n}
"Choose your words carefully. I do not find all Rogue Traders equally pleasing." {n}Ulfar gives Calligos a defiant smile, an open challenge to fight.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Выбирай слова осторожно. Не все Вольные Торговцы одинаково приятны мне". {n}Ульфар дарит Каллигосу вызывающую улыбку, дышащую призывом к немедленной драке.{/n}

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「言葉は慎重に選ぶんだな。どの自由開拓者も等しく感じがいいとは思ってない」{n}ウルファーは大胆不敵な笑みをカリゴスに向ける。堂々と戦いを受ける構えだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Choose your words carefully. I do not find all Rogue Traders equally pleasing." {n}Ulfar gives Calligos a defiant smile, an open challenge to fight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「言葉は慎重に選ぶんだな。どの自由開拓者も等しく感じがいいとは思ってない」{n}ウルファーは大胆不敵な笑みをカリゴスに向ける。堂々と戦いを受ける構えだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “我劝你说话当心点。我可不觉得每个行商浪人都讨人喜欢。”{n}乌尔法向卡里戈斯挑衅地一笑，算是在公然挑战他。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Choose your words carefully. I do not find all Rogue Traders equally pleasing." {n}Ulfar gives Calligos a defiant smile, an open challenge to fight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我劝你说话当心点。我可不觉得每个行商浪人都讨人喜欢。”{n}乌尔法向卡里戈斯挑衅地一笑，算是在公然挑战他。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Choisissez vos mots avec soin. Je n'apprécie pas au même titre tous les libres-marchands. » {n}Ulfar lance un sourire provocateur à Calligos, un défi manifeste.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Choose your words carefully. I do not find all Rogue Traders equally pleasing." {n}Ulfar gives Calligos a defiant smile, an open challenge to fight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Choisissez vos mots avec soin. Je n'apprécie pas au même titre tous les libres-marchands. » {n}Ulfar lance un sourire provocateur à Calligos, un défi manifeste.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Mida bien sus palabras. No me agradan todos los Comerciantes Independientes». {n}Ulfar le dedica a Calligos una sonrisa desafiante, una invitación a luchar.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Choose your words carefully. I do not find all Rogue Traders equally pleasing." {n}Ulfar gives Calligos a defiant smile, an open challenge to fight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Mida bien sus palabras. No me agradan todos los Comerciantes Independientes». {n}Ulfar le dedica a Calligos una sonrisa desafiante, una invitación a luchar.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Wählt Eure Worte mit Bedacht. Ich finde nicht alle Freihändler gleichermaßen erbaulich." {n}Ulfar lächelt Calligos trotzig an ... eine offene Herausforderung zum Kampf.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Choose your words carefully. I do not find all Rogue Traders equally pleasing." {n}Ulfar gives Calligos a defiant smile, an open challenge to fight.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wählt Eure Worte mit Bedacht. Ich finde nicht alle Freihändler gleichermaßen erbaulich." {n}Ulfar lächelt Calligos trotzig an ... eine offene Herausforderung zum Kampf.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Sözlerini dikkatle seç. Tüm Hür Tacirleri aynı şekilde hoş karşılamam." {n}Ulfar, Calligos'a cüretkâr bir şekilde gülümsüyor. Dövüşmek için açıkça meydan okuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Choose your words carefully. I do not find all Rogue Traders equally pleasing." {n}Ulfar gives Calligos a defiant smile, an open challenge to fight.{/n}
